title: Secure, Simple, and Easy
text: The SASS is only available to social profits within the RMWB.  Once you’ve created an account, you’ll be able to log in, add your assets and browse for items you may need for an upcoming event.  All organizations utilizing the SASS will be required to provide a charity registration  number which will be verified.  Contact information will be shared with the requesting agency so that parties can connect directly and establish pick up, returns and any other details about the asset.

section.title: List Items
section.content: Click the 'List Asset' button to add an item. This can be as broad as 'Production Equipment' or as specific as 'Label Printer'. People will be able to book your item through a form, or contact you directly.

section.title: Borrow Items
section.content: Found an item that you need? Click on it and book the item for a time through the provided form. Need to talk about more? Contact them directly through the given information.
